titles: A ioyfull medytacyon to all Englonde of the coronacyon of our moost naturall souerayne lorde kynge Henry the eyght
author: Hawes, Stephen, d. 1523?
publisher: In the fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Imperfect: leaves cropped at foot, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Henry --  VIII, --  King of England, 1491-1547 --  Coronation --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
